about.title:
Digitalized and proven
logistics company
about.description: A digitally advanced logistics company providing fast, precise, and secure transportation solutions. We use the latest technologies to optimize supply chains and automate processes. Our reliability and innovation ensure efficiency and transparency at every step of your logistics journey.
about.item-1-description: Send your products or packages to any location across Europe.
about.item-2-description: With 100% success rate in goods and package delivery, we offer express shipments throughout the EU within 24 hours!

services.title:
Fast and professional
logistics services
services.item-1-description: Transport up to 24t with standard, box, or refrigerated trucks 13.6m or tandems throughout Europe. 12t and 7.5t trucks with tarps/box/refrigerated, and oversized transport
services.item-2-description: Express shipments throughout the EU within 24 hours
services.item-3-description: Van with capacity up to 1000kg, with a lifting ramp and manual forklift
services.item-4-description: We connect you with all destinations, quickly and reliably

steps.title: Our Cargo Handling Process
steps.item-1-description: After you send an inquiry for your transport to our email address, we contact you and check the loading and unloading addresses, the transport duration you want, type of goods, and dimensions of the goods.
steps.item-2-description: We offer an option for your transport and wait for confirmation from your side.
steps.item-3-description: Our teams will work hard at every step of the journey to ensure that your shipment is delivered on time.

banner.title: Your logistics partner offering the highest quality services

why-us.title: Several reasons to choose us
why-us.item-1-description: LogX connects your business with international hubs throughout the European Union.
why-us.item-2-description: You place the order, and we'll take care of the rest. From pickup to customs clearance and tracking.
why-us.item-3-description: Our dedicated team is on task, tracking every step of your shipment and always available for communication.
why-us.item-4-description: If your goods require special transport, storage, and handling, we have the necessary expertise.
why-us.item-5-description: We provide personalized solutions for all products that can be transported with our vehicles.
why-us.item-6-description: More than 100 clients have chosen us as their transport partner due to our competitiveness and service quality.

footer.description-1:
A reliable logistics company with years of experience in safe transport and storage of goods.


Our expert team provides personalized solutions for all types of transport, with a guarantee of accuracy and timely delivery.

Our priority is the safety of your goods and customer satisfaction.

contact.form-title: Feel free to write to us
